mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, WXFABH, BB, ZWMS, YWMS, JX, JH_SXRQ, SJ_SXRQ, ZDBMID, ZDRID, ZDSJ, SXBMID, SXRID, SXSJ, ZT, F_BBID, B_BBID, BZ, ZXBS

B.ID, B.DPRTCODE, B.WXFABH, B.BB, B.ZWMS, B.YWMS, B.JX, B.JH_SXRQ, B.SJ_SXRQ, B.ZDBMID, B.ZDRID, B.ZDSJ, B.SXBMID, B.SXRID, B.SXSJ, B.ZT, B.F_BBID, B.B_BBID , B.BZ , B.ZXBS , B.SXJYRID, ZU.ID AS ZID , ZU.USERNAME AS ZUSERNAME, ZU.REALNAME AS ZREALNAME, SU.ID AS SID, SU.USERNAME AS SUSERNAME, SU.REALNAME AS SREALNAME, XU.ID AS XID, XU.USERNAME AS XUSERNAME, XU.REALNAME AS XREALNAME

sql.if: and ( UPPER(B.WXFABH) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.ZWMS) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.JX) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.BB) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.BZ) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(ZU.USERNAME) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or UPPER(ZU.REALNAME) like UPPER('%'||#{keyword}||'%') )

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.jhSxrqBegin != null and paramsMap.jhSxrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.jhSxrqEnd != null and paramsMap.jhSxrqEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sjSxrqBegin != null and paramsMap.sjSxrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.sjSxrqEnd != null and paramsMap.sjSxrqEnd != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.zdrqBegin != null and paramsMap.zdrqBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.zdrqEnd != null and paramsMap.zdrqEnd != ''

choose.when: AND exists ( SELECT 1 from D_007 where B.jx = FJJX AND B.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND zt = 1 )

mapper.select:
select
from B_G_011 B left join T_USER ZU on B.ZDRID = ZU.ID left join T_USER SU on B.SXRID = SU.ID left join T_USER XU on B.SXJYRID = XU.ID where B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DISTINCT JX from B_G_011 where ZT != 8 and DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} and WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from B_G_011 where ZT != 8 and DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} and BB = (SELECT MAX(BB) FROM B_G_011 WHERE ZT != 8 and DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} and WXFABH = #{wxfabh}) and WXFABH = #{wxfabh}
SELECT B.BB FROM B_G_011 B WHERE B.ZT != 8 and B.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} and B.WXFABH = #{wxfabh} ORDER BY B.BB DESC
SELECT MAX(B.BB) FROM B_G_011 B WHERE B.ZT != 8 and B.DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode} and B.WXFABH = #{wxfabh}

SELECT B.WXFABH,B.ZWMS,B.DPRTCODE from B_G_011 B JOIN (SELECT WXFABH,DPRTCODE,MAX(BB) AS BB FROM B_G_011 where ZT != 8 GROUP BY WXFABH,DPRTCODE) C ON B.WXFABH = C.WXFABH AND B.DPRTCODE = C.DPRTCODE AND B.BB = C.BB WHERE B.ZT != 8
AND exists ( SELECT 1 from D_007 where B.jx = FJJX AND B.DPRTCODE = DPRTCODE AND zt = 1 ) and exists (select 1 from t_department d where d.id = B.DPRTCODE)
AND exists ( SELECT 1 from V_ROLE_JX where B.jx= FJJX AND B.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) and exists (select 1 from t_user2role ur join t_role2dprt rd on ur.role_id = rd.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rd.dprt_id = B.DPRTCODE)
ORDER BY B.DPRTCODE ASC,B.WXFABH ASC
mapper.insert: insert into B_G_011 ( ID, DPRTCODE, WXFABH, BB, ZWMS, YWMS, JX, JH_SXRQ, SJ_SXRQ, ZDBMID, ZDRID, ZDSJ, SXBMID, SXRID, SXSJ, ZT, F_BBID, B_BBID, BZ, ZXBS ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zdbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

ID,
DPRTCODE,
WXFABH,
BB,

mapper.update: update B_G_011 set SJ_SXRQ = to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'), SXBMID = #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXRID = #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXSJ = sysdate, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SXJYRID = #{sxjyrid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_G_011
WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BB = #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWMS = #{ywms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JH_SXRQ = #{jhSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SJ_SXRQ = #{sjSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZDBMID = #{zdbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDRID = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZDSJ = #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SXBMID = #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXRID = #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXSJ = #{sxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
F_BBID = #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_G_011 set
WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BB = #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWMS = #{ywms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JH_SXRQ = #{jhSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SJ_SXRQ = #{sjSxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZDBMID = #{zdbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDRID = #{zdrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDSJ = #{zdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SXBMID = #{sxbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXRID = #{sxrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXSJ = #{sxsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, F_BBID = #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
WITH NEWESTWXFA AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B_G_011.ID,B_G_011.WXFABH,B_G_011.ZWMS,B_G_011.JX,B_G_011.BB,B_G_011.DPRTCODE,MAX(BB) OVER (PARTITION BY JX, DPRTCODE) MAXBB FROM B_G_011 WHERE ZT = 3 AND JX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )A WHERE A.BB = A.MAXBB ORDER BY A.JX ), NEWESTDJXH AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B_G_012.WXFABH,B_G_012.DJBH,B_G_012.ID,B_G_012.ZWMS,B_G_012.BZ,B_G_012.BB,B_G_012.DPRTCODE,MAX(BB) OVER (PARTITION BY WXFABH, DJBH, DPRTCODE) MAXBB FROM B_G_012 WHERE ZT = 3 AND YXX = 1 )A WHERE A.BB = A.MAXBB )
SELECT W.JX,W.ID,W.WXFABH,W.ZWMS,D.ID AS DJXMID,D.DJBH,D.ZWMS AS DJXMZWMS,D.BZ AS DJXMBZ,D.BB AS BB, B.ID AS JKXMID,B.JKLBH,B.JKFLBH,B.ZQZ,B.DW,D2.MS AS JKLMS FROM NEWESTWXFA W LEFT JOIN NEWESTDJXH D ON W.WXFABH = D.WXFABH AND W.DPRTCODE = D.DPRTCODE AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM B_S_00103 WHERE B_S_00103.ZT = 1 AND B_S_00103.DJBH = D.DJBH AND B_S_00103.DPRTCODE = D.DPRTCODE AND B_S_00103.WXFABH = D.WXFABH AND B_S_00103.ZJQDID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) LEFT JOIN B_G_01201 B ON D.ID = B.DJXMID AND B.ZT = 1 LEFT JOIN D_006 D1 ON B.JKFLBH = D1.JKFLBH LEFT JOIN D_00601 D2 ON B.JKLBH = D2.JKLBH ORDER BY D.DJBH, D1.PXH, D2.PXH

WITH NEWESTWXFA AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B_G_011.ID,B_G_011.WXFABH,B_G_011.JX,B_G_011.BB,B_G_011.DPRTCODE,MAX(BB) OVER (PARTITION BY JX, DPRTCODE) MAXBB FROM B_G_011 WHERE ZT = 3 AND JX = #{fjjx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DPRTCODE = #{dprtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )A WHERE A.BB = A.MAXBB ORDER BY A.JX ), NEWESTDJXH AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B_G_012.WXFABH,B_G_012.DJBH,B_G_012.ID,B_G_012.ZWMS,B_G_012.BZ,B_G_012.BB,B_G_012.DPRTCODE,MAX(BB) OVER (PARTITION BY WXFABH, DJBH, DPRTCODE) MAXBB FROM B_G_012 WHERE ZT = 3 AND YXX = 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM B_S_00103 WHERE B_S_00103.ZT = 1 AND B_S_00103.DJBH = B_G_012.DJBH AND B_S_00103.WXFABH = B_G_012.WXFABH AND B_S_00103.DPRTCODE = B_G_012.DPRTCODE) )A WHERE A.BB = A.MAXBB )
SELECT W.JX,W.ID,W.WXFABH,D.ID AS DJXMID,D.DJBH,D.ZWMS AS DJXMZWMS,D.BZ AS DJXMBZ, B.ID AS JKXMID,B.JKLBH,B.JKFLBH,B.ZQZ,B.DW,D2.MS AS JKLMS FROM NEWESTWXFA W INNER JOIN NEWESTDJXH D ON W.WXFABH = D.WXFABH AND W.DPRTCODE = D.DPRTCODE INNER JOIN B_G_01201 B ON D.ID = B.DJXMID LEFT JOIN D_006 D1 ON B.JKFLBH = D1.JKFLBH LEFT JOIN D_00601 D2 ON B.JKLBH = D2.JKLBH WHERE B.ZT = 1 ORDER BY D.DJBH, D1.PXH, D2.PXH
